briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety of a New Dilution and Injection Volume of AbobotulinumtoxinA for the Treatment of Glabellar Lines

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Moderate to severe glabellar lines at maximum frown
* Understands the study requirements and signs an informed consent form

Exclusion Criteria:

* Botulinum toxin treatment in the face within 6 months prior to study treatment

outcomeMeasures.title: Evaluate Composite Responder Rate at Month 1 for a Single Dose of AbobotulinumtoxinA Compared to Placebo
outcomeMeasures.description: Composite responder is defined as a subject who achieves a score of 0 or 1 and at least 2 grades improvement on both the Investigator Live Assessment (ILA) and the Subject Self Assessment (SSA)
